description: Canvas to Blob is a polyfill for the standard JavaScript canvas.toBlob method. It can be used to create Blob objects from an HTML canvas element.

name: blueimp-canvas-to-blob

scripts.build: cd js && uglifyjs canvas-to-blob.js -c -m -o canvas-to-blob.min.js --source-map url=canvas-to-blob.min.js.map
scripts.postversion: git push --tags origin master master:gh-pages && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.unit: PORT=$(get-port) concurrently -k -s first 'npm run serve' 'npm run mocha'
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A js

title: JavaScript Canvas to Blob
